structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Board Of Public Accountancy; Officers; Records Of Proceedings; Register; Meetings

text.section: The board shall annually elect a chairman and a secretary from its members. The board shall hold meetings at such times as it shall determine, and may adopt, revoke and amend from time to time regulations for the orderly conduct of its internal affairs and practice. A majority of the board shall constitute a quorum for the transaction of business.
